teacher_info.intro: Hi everyone! I'm Yunzheng, from Fujian, in the southeast of China. I have three years of experience teaching. Currently, I work as an English teacher at a private middle school in Mexico City. I love traveling and have been to 50 countries. In addition to speaking Chinese natively and English bilingually, I speak Spanish and French. I am patient and friendly. I love meeting new people and helping others. Before becoming a teacher, I was a social worker in the US. I grew up both in China and the US, and spent a semester in Morocco. Having spent most of my adolescence in China and having attended traditional Chinese public schools, I have a deep understanding of Chinese language and culture.

Hi everyone, I'm Anita! I am a young and experienced Mandarin teacher;) No matter which Chinese level you are or what purpose of studying Mandarin, I  am here and I can help you know more about this wonderful language!

Hi~My name is Chen Yanxi. 
I am a native Chinese speaker from Changsha,in the Hunan province.
I was a volunteer Chinese teacher and also a qualified HSK test invigilator at a Confucius Institute in Thailand.I have a master‘s degree in  teaching Chinese.I have been teaching Chinese for 5 years(2 years at my university,1year in Thailand and 2 years on italki), I teach students of all levels,from all around the world. I am an experienced Chinese teacher who is passionate about teaching  and is very patient. 
Feel free to contact me.

Hello there! My name is Mick. Thank you for checking out my profile. If you're considering learning or already learning Mandarin Chinese, and you want to find a native speaker to help you learn and brush up, then I may be the person you're looking for.  I majored in English in university, and I've been using English for jobs ever since, so I can speak English fluently. I am a learner of languages myself so I know learning a language is a process, and I'd be glad to help you along the way.
大家好，我叫袁千梦，你们也可以叫我Silvia。很高兴能有这样一个机会在这里和大家一起学习和交流中文。中华文化博大精深，汉字作为中华文化的载体更是源远流长。如果你来到我的课堂，我会带领你一起揣摩汉语的魅力。让我们一起共同学习、共同进步！

Hello! 你好！My name is Vivian. I’m a ICLTA (International Chinese Language Teachers Association) certified Chinese teacher from China, a Mandarin and Cantonese native speaker who was born and raised in Guangzhou, capital of Guangdong province. I’m also learning English and Spanish on italki. I like reading, cooking and traveling. I enjoy teaching and learning languages because I believe that a new language sees a new world.

Hello, there! If you are interested in Chinese, I mean the language, the people or the culture, I am your teacher. I will motivate you to create your own sentences to express yourself. I focus on Chinese for children and speaking Chinese.With the help of pictures and videos, you can understand the vocabulary and grammar easily and effectively. At the same time,  I am very outgoing and patient. I believe the process of learning a new language is the journey to knowing interesting life of other group of people. We will share many funny things happening in daily life.出生于中国西南城市重庆，现在住在中国西安。比较安静，但不缺乏对生活的热爱和激情。喜欢阅读、旅游、运动。对世界各地的风土人情、风俗习惯、历史文化兴趣浓厚。喜欢挑战自己，希望不断超越自己，丰富自己的人生体验。

《Native Chinese Speaker/TCSOL Certification》
Hello! My name is Mary.
I am a professional native speaking Mandarin. 
I'm always a happy person and always talkative!
I was born and raised in Taipei and I have lived in Shanghai and Tokyo.
I studied International business and I have 6 years experience worked in the company so I also teach business Chinese.
I love to eat and travel. I have also been to 15 countries.
I've been teaching online since 2015. I've given over 30,000 lessons 
help students to pass Chinese exam and achieve their goal. 
Welcome to try my lesson. thanks!

Hello everyone, I am Lucy from Changchun, Jilin. I grew up in a northern city in China. I can speak standard Mandarin Chinese. I love my language and culture. At the same time, I prefer to communicate with people from different countries. I usually like to read books, watch movies, and travel when I have time. I am a cheerful, enthusiastic, and patient person, so it will be easy and pleasant for you to learn and communicate with me! The culture of language is profound and colorful. I think that learning a language is a happy thing.
大家好，我是来自吉林长春的Lucy，在中国的北方城市长大。我能说标准的汉语普通话，我热爱我的语言文化，同时，我更喜欢和来自不同国家的人交流。平时喜欢读书、看电影，有时间还会去旅游，我是一个开朗热情、很有耐心的人，所以，你和我在一起学习交流会很轻松愉快！语言的文化博大精深、丰富多彩，我认为，学习语言是一件快乐的事。

Hi!   I'm Michael from Tianjin  China and graduated from Sichuan university that ranks 10th among 2000 Chinese colleges .I am an experienced Chinese  tutor  and was born in a town between Tianjin and Beijing,so actually mandarin is my mother tongue. if you would like to speak mandarin well, feel free to contact me please.

I am Lily, from northeast of China. Now I live in Beijing.  I used to work in library.Now I am a full-time online teacher and working on my Chinese teaching project.I love learning languages and cross-culture. I truly value the communication of different cultures.And I think both  practice and have fun are important for learning language.Those are basically my thing of teaching Mandarin.
I keep an open mind on lots of things, economics ,environment issues, technology,politics ,religion, philosophy,etc,but  also I  am certain of something that I believe.

Hi,everyone!Congratulations!I admire that you are all diligent.My name is Osmond,I‘m native speaker of Chinese.I have a strong passion to share my ideas to learn Chinese well and i have flexible times to teach yours.In my spare time,i write some articles,do some foreign exchanges,stocks and futures.I love all sports,especially go jogging,go swimming.I am into reading and travelling also.I can do fortune-telling.I am pretty open-minded and patient,so be free to ask my questions.I would like to customize a study plan for your guys and try my best to meet your real needs.
大家好，我叫Osmond,我热爱分享我的学习经验，我会为你们定制不一样的课程去尽可能满足你们的所有要求。我是一个思想开明的人，所以不要害怕问我问题，我会耐心的帮助你们更好的学好中文。

Hello everyone! I am Annie. I come from Yunnan, Kunming. I have beening teaching Chinese for four years. During my studies, I worked as a volunteer for Confucius Institute and went to Indonesia for one—year intership. After graduation, I worked as a Mandarin teacher in the school.

Please note the following things:
*You can only reschedule/cancel up to 24 hours prior to a lesson.
*If students are late more than 10 minutes without notice, the lesson will be considered a no-show and charged full amount.

Hello, my name is Candy and I am Chinese from Shanghai. Currently I am living in the beautiful city of Yokohama, Japan, where I have resided for over 7 years.  After I graduated from university with a PhD degree in Theoretical Physics, I realized that communicating with people suits my personality much more strongly as opposed to doing academic research work. Right now I am working as a salesperson at an IT company. I love people and I always have a fervent passion for languages and cultures. I have been teaching languages on italki for 5 years. I speak English, Chinese, Japanese and conversational Spanish.
I am a professional Chinese teacher in Italy. In addition, I am a scientific researcher. English is my working language and I use Italian in my daily life.

Hi, everyone, my name is Chuan. As a native speaker,I can speak Mandarin and Cantonese. 

I am a teacher who is patient, lovely and a little bit strict,I worked  as a tutor at Disney company for more than 2 years, then I worked as a journalist for 2 years, so I always pay attention to grammar and correcting typos.

user_info.nickname: Lucy Li 澳洲注册教师

teacher_info.intro:
Due to my full-time job, I have to reduce my availability on italki. Feel free to ask me if you can't find a perfect time on my schedule!

Hi everyone! 大家好~ 안녕하세요^^Hola❤️

I'm Lucy:) I was born and raised in China and moved to Australia in 2012. I speak Mandarin with my family, so Mandarin is still the language that I feel most comfortable with. My experiences of teaching young children in Melbourne helped me a lot with explaining complicated concepts in English :)

我是lucy~ 我出生在中国，2012年来到澳大利亚。我读完了学前教育的本科, 目前是维州注册幼教+小学老师。全程用英文教学是完全没问题的☺️如果觉得找不会说中文的纯外国人会有压力的话，就来定我的课吧！课程上用不用中文都可以哦^o^ 

안녕하세요, 루시에요^^. 저는 중국에서 태어나고, 2012년 호주 멜버른에서 유학하기 시작했어요. 제 전공은 교육이고, 최근에 졸업했어요~ 간단한 한국말로 중국어와 영어수업을 가르칠 수 있어요^^

Hi, there.I am Grace, I was born and raised in China. I currently live in Changchun Jilin Province. I have been growing up in China, I am a native Mandarin Chinese speaker, I like Chinese language, and I can speak Chinese fluently. I am a lovely and cheerful person. I like reading, writing, watching movies and travelling.
大家好，我是Grace，我出生在中国，现居住在吉林省长春市，我一直在中国长大，我的母语是汉语，我很喜欢汉语，我会说一口流利的汉语普通话。我是一个活泼开朗喜欢微笑的人，平时比较喜欢读书、写作、看电影、旅游。

Hello everyone! I'm Olivia. My master's major is Teaching Chinese to speakers of other language and my undergraduate major is English. I have been engaged in Chinese teaching for two years. I have rich experience in teaching both children and adults. No matter what your Chinese level is, your need is to take HSK exam or you just like Chinese. I can make unique learning content for you according to your needs. Looking forward to your appointment , let's learn Chinese together!

Hi . My name is Lily. I am a native Chinese speaker.l got Putonghua Shuiping Ceshi(Mandarin Test) in 2010.  I have been working for an International Trading Company for over six years now. I also studied an “International Trade” course in College. So if you want I can also help you learn business Chinese.
